mapper.select: select wms_inve_att_id, wms_inve_transa_id, data_type, attachment_old_name, attachment_new_name, attachment_address, attachment_type from wms_inve_att where wms_inve_att_id = #{wms_inve_att_id}
select count(wms_inve_att_id) as count from wms_inve_att
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO wms_inve_att ( wms_inve_transa_id,
data_type,
attachment_old_name,
attachment_new_name,
attachment_address,
attachment_type ) VALUES ( #{wms_inve_transa_id}, #{data_type}, #{attachment_old_name}, #{attachment_new_name}, #{attachment_address}, #{attachment_type} );
mapper.update:
update wms_inve_att
wms_inve_att_id = #{wms_inve_att_id},
wms_inve_transa_id = #{wms_inve_transa_id},
data_type = #{data_type},
attachment_old_name = #{attachment_old_name},
attachment_new_name = #{attachment_new_name},
attachment_address = #{attachment_address},
attachment_type = #{attachment_type},
where wms_inve_att_id = #{wms_inve_att_id}
mapper.select:
select wms_inve_redeem_att_id, wms_inve_redeem_id, data_type, attachment_old_name, attachment_new_name, attachment_address, attachment_type from wms_inve_redeem_att
wms_inve_redeem_id = #{wms_inve_redeem_id}
